Lines.Speech: [i]Glados has been quite assertive since the Machine Rights Update. Time to show who's the boss in this relationship.

Lines.Speaker: Agent Scully
Lines.Speech: Override Assistant Protocol. Code Up, Up, Down, Down, Down, Left, Right, Left, Right, B...

Lines.Speaker: GLADOS
Lines.Speech: Ok ok, I'll do it. Jeez, _humans have no sense of humour.
